work_history.title: Project Manager
accomplishments: Created and developed a safe testing environment for electrochemical cells: eg. using the exact same ion-diffusion equations as those used for Li-Ion battery testing.
Tested and measured the voltage, current and resistance changes to evaluate cell performance.
Create monthly Powerpoint presentations to display performance testing results to the team, using Python scripts to extract big data for analysis.

work_history.title: Battery & Electrochemical Validation
accomplishments: Conducted Li-Ion battery cell safety and environmental testing, including hands-on battery (coin-cell) assembling and aging effect testing for batteries utilizing different current-charging rates.
Communicated and presented performance data at multiple international conferences, including in the US, Singapore and South Korea.
Comprehensive battery analysis resulted in 5 published peer-reviewed papers on Li-Ion battery testing methods.

highlights: Stockholm-based battery validation specialist with over 4 years of Li-ion battery testing experience. Validation work boosted battery performance by up to 21%.
Developed two new battery testing patents, including one cited by Intel that improved battery life by 16.7 %.
Achieved recent Coursera certifications in Battery Management Systems, Circuit Cell Modeling and Battery State of Health.
